price: 128. Ciertamente, Al-lah está con quienes Lo temen y hacen el bien.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّٱلَّذِينَ هُم مُّحۡسِنُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha maʿa alladhīna ittaqaw wa-alladhīna hum muḥ'sinūna
